blueprint.description: Installs Starship (a cross-shell prompt) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Starship](https://starship.rs/) is the minimal, blazing fast, and extremely customizable prompt for any shell! It shows the information you need, while staying sleek and minimal. Unlike most other prompts, it is compatible with nearly every type of terminal. If you want to retain the same look and feel across different terminals, then look no further.
blueprint.name: Starship
blueprint.title: Starship
